dplyr tbl cube from NetCDF

dplyr tbl cube from NetCDF

hyper_tbl_cube(x, ...)

# S3 method for tidync
hyper_tbl_cube(x, ...)

# S3 method for character
hyper_tbl_cube(x, ...)

# S3 method for hyperfilter
hyper_tbl_cube(x, ...)

Arguments

x

filename
...

arguments for hyper_filter

Value

tbl_cube dplyr::tbl_cube

Examples

ufile <- system.file("extdata", "unidata", "madis-hydro.nc", package = "tidync")
tidync(ufile)
#>

#>
